messages.message: Hi all, the danger build is failing for my PR https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/32368 with message `RuntimeError: Cannot find a merge base between danger_base and danger_head. If you are using shallow clone/fetch, try increasing the --depth`. All other checks have passed. Has anyone run into this before?

I’ve had that happen when I have >10 commits in my branch, I think it can also occur if your branch is many commits behind master (not sure exactly now many). In my experience its mostly harmless though!
you can still merge even with the danger error
yeah I guess it’s not a problem
